headline: IBM's Edge AI Expansion With Datavault AI: Will it Boost Profits?
summary: International Business Machines extended its collaboration with Datavault AI to deliver secure, ultra-low-latency enterprise AI at the edge with watsonx-powered zero-trust micro data centers.

headline: Quantum Computing Stocks: 'Winner-Take-All Scenario' Possible, Says JPMorgan
summary: A "winner-take-all scenario" is possible, said JPMorgan in a report on quantum computing stocks that looked at IBM, Google and other players.

raw.headline: Quantum Computing Stocks: 'Winner-Take-All Scenario' Possible, Says JPMorgan

headline: What's Next for Seagate Stock After a 241.8% Stellar Run in a Year?
summary: STX has surged nearly 242% in a year as AI-driven data growth, tight HDD supply and rising HAMR adoption fuel demand for high-capacity drives.

raw.headline: What's Next for Seagate Stock After a 241.8% Stellar Run in a Year?

headline: Izzi Software Signs Reseller Agreements with VIRTUTEM, ITSA
summary: NEW YORK, January 12, 2026--Izzi Software, a leading provider of innovative enterprise software solutions, today announced that it has inked two global reseller deals with VIRTUTEM and IT Service Alliance (ITSA). VIRTUTEM will sell the IBM i product through Izzi subsidiary CNX, while ITSA will sell the ColeSoft IBM Z offering. These leading software platforms will be bundled with VIRTUTEM’s and ITSA’s existing services to enable them to help their customers solve their most pressing technical an

headline: FPX: Leading IPO ETF With A Few Unexpected Holdings
